Class GridComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper.gamelogic.GridComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GridComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to represent a cell in the minesweeper grid
    Author:
    Ryan Wiener
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GridComponent​()
      Creates default grid element sets open to false, flagged to false ans symbol to '0'

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Get string representation of cell
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
